name: Bit Blaster XL
summary: A throwback to the classic quarter eating arcade games of the 80's. Bit Blaster XL is a retro styled, addictive, and fast paced arcade shoot 'em up! (shmup).
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: STG 射击游戏
  • 游戏引擎: Unity
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2016-1-22
  • 售价: $0.99
  • 官方网站: https://store.steampowered.com/app/433950/Bit_Blaster_XL/
  • 开发商: Adamvision Studios
  • 发行: Adamvision Studios
